name: Bella Bistro
description: A charming Italian bistro known for its handcrafted pastas, wood-fired pizzas, and cozy ambiance. Perfect for a casual dinner with friends or a romantic evening out

name: Urban Eats
description: A trendy urban café that serves a mix of contemporary American and European dishes. Known for its artisanal coffees, gourmet burgers, and eclectic interior design.

name: Spice Haven
description: An exotic restaurant offering a delightful fusion of Indian and Thai cuisines. Enjoy a variety of spicy and aromatic dishes in a vibrant, colorful setting.

name: Ocean's Delight
description: A seafood lover's paradise offering fresh catches daily, from succulent lobster to delicate sushi. The restaurant's nautical theme creates a serene dining experience.

name: Garden Grille
description: A farm-to-table restaurant that prides itself on using locally sourced ingredients to create delicious and wholesome meals. The garden-inspired décor adds to the refreshing ambiance.
